```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
load("first-post/programas_df.RData")
import::from("first-post/text_clean_up.R", text_clean_up)
library("dplyr")
```

```{r}
programas <- mutate(programas_df_renamed, clean_text = text_clean_up(text)) %>% 
  select(-text) %>% 
  tidytext::unnest_tokens(sentence, clean_text, token = "sentences") %>%
  group_by(doc_id) %>% 
  mutate(sentence_id = row_number()) %>%
  select(doc_id, sentence_id, sentence)
```
